DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing GDC 695 Diclofenac Sodium Gel , 3 % Subjects With Actinic Keratoses
DOC.criteria: Has provide write informed consent . Immunocompetent male and/or nonpregnant female , 18 year age old . Willing able apply test article ( ) direct , comply study instruction , commit followup visit duration study . Clinical diagnosis actinic keratosis . In good general health free disease state physical condition . Women , must postmenopausal , surgically sterile , use effective method birth control negative urine pregnancy test ( UPT ) Baseline Visit ( Day 1 ) . Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant breastfeed study . Is currently enrol another investigational drug device study use investigational drug investigational device within 30 day prior Baseline Visit ( Day 1 ) . Has need plan expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight study . Is immunosuppressed ( e.g. , human immunodeficiency virus [ HIV ] , systemic malignancy , graft host disease , etc . ) take medication suppress immune system . Has experience unsuccessful outcome previous topical diclofenac sodium therapy . Has history sensitivity ingredient test article excipients test reference drug . Has sign symptom consistent aspirin ( ASA ) triad . Has use topical medication : corticosteroid , alpha hydroxy acid ( e.g. , glycolic acid , lactic acid , etc . > 5 % ) , beta hydroxy acid ( salicylic acid > 2 % ) , urea > 2 % , 5fluorouracil , diclofenac , imiquimod , ingenol mebutate , aminolevulinic acid ( ALA ) prescription retinoids ( e.g. , tazarotene , adapalene , tretinoin ) , overthecounter ( OTC ) product label scrub kind use smooth skin ( contain form exfoliant nut shell , coffee ground , polymer particle , etc . ) within select treatment area ( face bald scalp ) within one month prior Baseline Visit . Has cryodestruction chemodestruction , curettage , photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) , surgical excision , treatment AK within select treatment area ( face bald scalp ) within one month prior Baseline Visit . Has use oral corticosteroid therapy , interferon , cytotoxic drug , immunomodulators , immunosuppressive therapy , retinoids within one month prior Baseline Visit . Has use oral isotretinoin within six month prior Baseline Visit . Has use chemical peel , include limited alphahydroxy acid , betahydroxy acid , bichloroacetic acid , trichloroacetic acid , phenol within select treatment area ( face bald scalp ) within six month prior Baseline Visit . Has dermatologic procedure surgery : laser resurfacing , PUVA ( Psoralen + ultraviolet A ) therapy , ultraviolet B ( UVB ) therapy , ALAPDT , dermabrasion within select treatment area ( face bald scalp ) within six month prior Baseline Visit . Has lesion suspicious skin cancer ( skin cancer rule biopsy ) untreated skin cancer within select treatment area ( face bald scalp ) . Has active gastrointestinal ulceration bleed history gastrointestinal bleeds due use aspirin NSAIDs . Has severe renal hepatic impairment . Has condition , investigator 's opinion , could interfere evaluation test drug could make unsafe preclude subject 's ability fully participate research study .
